question: ‘Berlinale’ is the 70th edition of which famous festival, which is set to be inaugurated in Germany?
explanation:
The 70th edition of the famous Berlin film festival \"Berlinale\" is set to be held from 20th February to 1st march, this year. The Ministry of Information & Broadcasting of India, in collaboration with Confederation of Indian Industry (CII), is participating in the festival.
Union External Affairs Minister of India, S. Jaishankar will inaugurate the Indian Pavilion. Three Indian feature films and a short documentary film have been selected for screening in the global event.
